A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Absolute garbage. The fact that not only murders the old characters and universe\, but introduces an incredible number of plot holes into the universe is just the icing of the cake.
Excluding an (admittedly) outstanding use of color\, the rest is garbage. Characters are shallow\, the plot is nonsensical PLUS additional\, even more idiotic sub-plots.
It looks like a badly written TV-series\, in which the twist is introduced for the sake of it.
All the epic feel of the old movies\, or at least the clumsy campiness of the prequels\, is lost.
This is the movie that killed Star Wars.
